Family Features Despite busy lives and full schedules finding time for regular meals with loved ones encourages connections and conversations that can benefit mental and physical wellbeing PERIOD Gathering your family friends coworkers or neighbors at least once a week to spend time together over a meal provides opportunities to decompress and socialize PERIOD
If youre looking for a little delicious inspiration the American Heart Association recommends scheduling one night per week to create a recurring tradition and enjoy favorites such as breakfast for dinner PERIOD Recipes like Egg Avocado and Black Bean Breakfast Burritos Huevos Rancheros and Southwestern Quinoa and Egg Breakfast Bowls from the Healthy for Good Eat Smart initiative nationally supported by Egglands Best are perfectly suited for sharing while making time to destress at the dinner table PERIOD
In fact according to a study by Canadian Family Physician regular meals at home with loved ones can reduce stress boost selfesteem and make everyone feel connected with mealtime conversations that allow a chance to unplug and unwind PERIOD
Meals dont have to be elaborate for a successful evening together PERIOD Despite the perceived effort involved with preparing a meal research published in Preventive Medicine shows those who have frequent meals with others particularly parents with their children may improve social and emotional wellbeing PERIOD
In addition to the mental and emotional benefits of meals with loved ones eating together can also encourage healthier choices when betterforyou recipes are on the menu PERIOD Dining as a group can provide inspiration to try hearthealthy recipes that include the wide variety of vegetables fruit whole grains and healthy protein sources recommended by the American Heart Association to help prevent heart disease and stroke PERIOD
